book.synopsis: Featuring a new introduction by novelist E. L. Doctorow, the Pulitzer Prize-winning novel recounts the story of a Midwestern physician who is forced to give up his profession due to the ignorance, corruption, and greed of society. Reprint.
book.dimensions: Height: 6.75 Inches, Length: 4.1 Inches, Weight: 0.5 Pounds, Width: 1 Inches
